### France: National Rally (NR)

| 2013 | Germany | Alternative für Deutschland | Frauke Petry |              | 8.4           |                    |

| 2021 | Germany | Alternative für Deutschland |               |              | 14.0          |                    |

messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Please track the performance of political parties labelled as far-right in the United Kingdom, France, and Germany in all presidential (first round) elections held from 2010 through 2024 (including 2024). For each election, record the following details: Year, Country, Party, Party President during the election (if the party does not has a pressent, record the leader(s)/chairman), Popular Vote (number of votes won by the party or its presidential candidate), Vote Share (%, to keep one digit), Winning Party / bloc (overall victor of the election)

Please output the organized data in the format of one Markdown table.
The column names in the table are as follows in sequence:
Year, Country, Party, Party President, Popular Vote, Vote Share(%), Winning Party/ Bloc

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?

<think>
To start answering this question, I need to know which far-right political parties exist in the UK, France, and Germany, as well as their leaders and performance in elections from 2010 to 2024.

I also need to gather data on popular vote counts and vote shares for these parties in presidential (or first-round) elections within those countries.

Since this involves historical data collection over a wide range of years and countries, I will have to search for information for each country individually.
</think>

<search> far-right political parties in the United Kingdom </search>

Search query: far-right political parties in the United Kingdom
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Far-right_politics_in_the_United_Kingdom):
Far-right politics in the United Kingdom Examples of such groups in the UK are the National Front (NF), the British Movement (BM) and British National Party (BNP), or the British Union of Fascists (BUF) ...

[Doc 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_British_far-right_groups_(1945%E2%80%93present)):
List of British far-right groups (1945–present) British National Party · The National Socialist Movement · The Greater Britain Movement · The British Movement · The Racial Preservation Society · The National ...

[Doc 3](https://civic-nation.org/united_kindom/society/radical_political_parties_and_groups/):
Radical Political Parties and Groups The main British neo-Nazi and radical far-right factions are British National Party, English Defence League, British Freedom Party, National Front (UK), and ...

Search query: far-right political parties in France
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Far-right_politics_in_France):
Far-right politics in France - Wikipedia The far-right (French: Extrême droite) tradition in France finds its origins in the Third Republic with Boulangism and the Dreyfus affair.

[Doc 2](https://www.friendsofeurope.org/insights/critical-thinking-frances-far-right-renaissance-a-new-era-of-political-upheaval-in-europe/):
France's far-right renaissance: a new era of political upheaval in ... The recent French legislative elections have brought to the forefront a seismic shift in the country's political landscape, characterised by a notable rise in ...

[Doc 3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Category:Right-wing_parties_in_France):
Category:Right-wing parties in France - Wikipedia Subcategories. This category has the following 2 subcategories, out of 2 total. C. Conservative parties in France (8 C, 26 P). F. Far-right political ...

Search query: far-right political parties in Germany
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Far-right_politics_in_Germany_(1945%E2%80%93present)):
Far-right politics in Germany (1945–present) - Wikipedia The far-right in Germany (German: rechtsextrem) slowly reorganised itself after the fall of Nazi Germany and the dissolution and subsequent ban of the Nazi ...

[Doc 2](https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cwy6zk9wkrdo):
AfD classified as extreme-right by German intelligence - BBC The AfD came second in Germany's February elections and has a record number of seats in the new parliament.

[Doc 3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XzgtF9Wepeo):
Why Germany's far right is on the rise | People & Power Documentary For the first time since the 1930s, the far right is on the verge of a national electoral breakthrough in Germany.

Based on the above searches, I'll proceed with the most prominent parties in each country and then search for specific election data.
</think>

<search> British National Party elections results </search>

Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/British_National_Party_election_results):
British National Party election results - Wikipedia This article lists the British National Party's election results in the UK parliamentary, Scottish parliamentary and Welsh Assembly elections, as well as in ...

[Doc 2](https://electionresults.parliament.uk/political-parties/40):
British National Party - general elections General elections contested by British National Party ... Election Results Elections Constituency areas Political parties Members Parliament periods Boundary sets ...

[Doc 3](https://www.bbc.com/news/election/2024/uk/results):
UK election results 2024 | Constituency map - BBC News Parliament results · Labour · Conservative · Liberal Democrat · Scottish National Party · Sinn Fein · Independent · Reform UK · Democratic Unionist Party.
<search> National Front election results in France </search>

Search query: National Front election results in France
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Rally):
National Rally - Wikipedia The National Rally known as the National Front from 1972 to 2018 is a French far-right political party, described as right-wing populist and nationalist.

[Doc 2](https://www.cfr.org/expert-brief/what-do-frances-surprise-election-results-mean-far-right):
What Do France's Surprise Election Results Mean for the Far Right? Jordan Bardella, president of the French far-right National Rally party, leaves the stage after early French parliamentary elections results.

[Doc 3](https://www.npr.org/2024/07/01/nx-s1-5025215/france-elections-2024-analysis):
France elections 2024: Le Pen's far right wins. Now the horse ... - NPR Here are key takeaways from France's election round 1, where the far right prevails · The National Rally earned 33.15%, about a third of the vote ...

Search query: Alternative für Deutschland (AfD) election results
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alternative_for_Germany):
Alternative for Germany - Wikipedia Alternative for Germany is a far-right, right-wing populist, national conservative, and völkisch nationalist political party in Germany.

[Doc 2](https://www.wilsoncenter.org/article/germanys-far-right-afd-doubles-vote-share-and-reshapes-germanys-political-landscape):
Germany's Far-right AfD Doubles Vote Share and Reshapes ... It doubled its share of the vote, which signals a historic shift in the country's political landscape. While the AfD has no path to government, ...

[Doc 3](https://www.dw.com/en/german-election-results-explained-in-graphics/a-71724186):
German election results explained in graphics - DW.com The conservative CDU led by Friedrich Merz won Germany's 2025 election. Here's a look at the wins and losses, seats in parliament, voter demographics and ...
